TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior Implements IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 指定安全性事件的稽核行為。

span.span: Specifies the audit behavior of security events.

summary.span: 一般而言，安全性事件是由如傳輸、訊息或交涉驗證和授權事件的驗證事件所組成。

span.span: In general, the security events consist of authentication events such as transport, message or negotiate authentication and authorization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來稽核 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 驗證事件。The class is used to audit Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) authentication events. 啟用稽核時，可以稽核成功或失敗的驗證嘗試 (或兩者)。When auditing is enabled, either successful or failed authentication attempts (or both) can be audited. 事件會寫入三個事件記錄檔之一：應用程式、安全性或作業系統版本的預設記錄檔。The events are written to one of three event logs: application, security, or the default log for the operating system version. 使用 Windows 事件檢視器，即可檢視所有的事件記錄。The event logs can all be viewed using the Windows Event viewer. 您可以使用這個類別來指定要將事件記錄寫入哪個記錄檔，以及要寫入的驗證事件的種類。Use this class to specify which event log is written to, as well as kinds of authentication events to write. 此外，您也可以將 屬性設定為 `false` (預設為 `true`) 以指定是否隱藏稽核失敗。You can also specify whether to suppress audit failures by setting the property to `false` (the default is `true`). 如需有關如何稽核安全性事件的 WCF 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 稽核](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md)。For more information about auditing security events for WCF applications, see [Auditing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md). 若要在組態中指定稽核行為，使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)。To specify audit behavior in configuration, use the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 類別的執行個體，並且將 新增至其行為集合。The following code creates an instance of the class and adds a new to its collection of behaviors. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定寫入安全性相關事件記錄的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location where secure-related event logs are written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要能寫入 `AuditLogLocation.Security`，執行中的執行緒 (或處理序) 必須擁有 `SeAuditPrivilege`。To be able to write to `AuditLogLocation.Security`, the running thread (or process) must possess `SeAuditPrivilege`. 您也可以設定此值使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中。You can also set this value using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 類別的執行個體，並設定這個屬性。The following code creates an instance of the class and sets this property. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要在訊息層級稽核的驗證事件類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of authentication events to audit at the message level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務應用程式有兩個層級，您可以強制執行安全性。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service applications have two levels where security can be enforced. 在*服務*層級，服務的所有方法會強制都執行相同的安全性原則。At the *service* level, all methods of the service are enforced by the same security policy. 服務中的個別方法可以有不同的 (更嚴格的) 安全性原則。Individual methods in the service can have a different (more stringent) security policy. 您可以使用 屬性來控制要稽核的訊息層級事件。Use the property to control which message level events are audited. 您也可以設定此值使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中。You can also set this value using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 類別的執行個體，並設定這個屬性。The following code creates an instance of the class and sets this property. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#3)]

exception.span: 和 不是 的有效成員。

summary.span: 取得或設定要在服務層級稽核的授權事件類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of authorization events to audit at the service level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務應用程式有兩個層級，您可以強制執行安全性。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service applications have two levels where security can be enforced. 在*服務*層級，服務的所有方法會強制都執行相同的安全性原則。At the *service* level, all methods of the service are enforced by the same security policy. 服務中的個別方法可以有不同的 (更嚴格的) 安全性原則。Individual methods in the service can have a different (more stringent) security policy. 您可以使用 屬性來控制要稽核的服務層級事件。Use the property to control which service level events are audited. 您也可以設定此值使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中。You can also set this value using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 類別的執行個體，並設定這個屬性。The following code creates an instance of the class and sets this property. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示稽核失敗是否影響應用程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether failure to audit affects the application.

value.span: 如果稽核失敗不影響應用程式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if failure to audit does not affect the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性為 `false`，稽核失敗就會造成擲回例外狀況並導致使用者要求失敗。If this property is `false`, failure to audit causes an exception to be thrown and results in user request failure. 您也可以設定此值使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中。You can also set this value using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 類別的執行個體，並設定這個屬性。The following code creates an instance of the class and sets this property. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: void IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription description, System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase, System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> endpoints, System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection parameters);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription description, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase, class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> endpoints, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection parameters) cil managed

virtual void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceDescription ^ description, System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^ serviceHostBase, System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceEndpoint ^> ^ endpoints, System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingParameterCollection ^ parameters) = System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior::AddBindingParameters;

summary.span: 將自訂資料傳遞至繫結項目，以支援合約實作。

span.span: Passes custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法將自訂資料物件加入至 `parameters` 集合，繫結項目可使用該集合取得額外的資訊，讓它們可以支援合約。Use this method to add custom data objects to the `parameters` collection that binding elements can use to acquire extra information to enable them to support the contract.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription description, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase) cil managed

summary.span: 提供功能以變更執行階段屬性值或插入自訂延伸物件，例如錯誤處理常式、訊息或參數攔截器、安全性延伸或其他自訂延伸物件。

span.span: Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，檢查或修改要建構來支援某些自訂執行案例的 物件。Use this method to inspect or modify the object that is being constructed to support some custom execution scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription description, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase) cil managed
